reviews.review_msg: Took this course a few years ago, and to this day, Barry Ledwidge stands out as my fav. professor in my university career. Classes are fun, engaged, interesting. He has a lot of experience and a lot of fun stories to relate to the topics at hand! Would recommend taking ANY course with him.
nice guy. uses the same notes and everything, every single year

Very good prof and fun course to take. In the exams there aren't a lot from lecture, maybe a few MC's and 1 SA. Very helpful too. It's not a lot to memmorize compared to 280. If someone still thinks there's too much to memorize in PSYC241, then PSYC and perhaps even University is not for you.

make sure you study his lecture notes! a lot of questions on the exam come from them. He's a good prof... had trouble hearing what he said sometimes and that was really annoying! the material near the end of the semester gets really interesting! especially the section about sexual dysfunctions haha.
Did not really attend much...so....but~ the ones I attended were fun. Funny prof and the course material were interesting.

Very dedicated to his work, yet did not meet my expectations. There is an overwhelming amount of detail to remember for his course based on etiology and treatment paradigms. Requires lots of reading and staggering memory recall. In class videos are a nice touch, but the lectures are somewhat monotonous. Heavy course content does not do him justice.
this is my favourite prof out of all.  you can definetly see that he knows what he's talking about and that he enjoys what he's doing. class is interesting and videos are educational.
man, this class was hard as hell, trust me dont take it, u ll fudge up man~~~~~~~
hello no, dont take it
If you send him an email he will respond immediately and marks assignments quickly. He really makes an effort to make the class both educational and enjoyable.  He is also very helpful.

Ppl say he mumbles, I disagree. Or at least its not as prevalent. He has a lot of exprience in the subject and relates it in lectures making them interesting. Uses humor and an easy going approach to cover difficult/hard to swallow subjects (ie paraphilia). Incorporates videos into lectures. Interesting/relevant assignment.
Ledwidge is a very nice, reasonable man with a lot of knowledge and passion about the subject he teaches.. I think he does an excellent job

I think he's great! His experience gives him real knowledge and credibility. He is down to earth considering he knows 1000 times more than the psyc profs who have only learned from books and not from working. His examples are awesome and he is really funny. Focus on key terms for the fill-in-the-blanks. Videos are boring. Highly recommended!

I like him.  Hr gives good examples and can be really funny. He also uses cartoons as examples.  The 3 hour lecture does not seem so unbearable with him, especially because he shows videos.  The midterm was much easier than i thought it would be.  and the final isnt even accumulative.
He mumbles too much so diffcult to understand what he's saying. Class was boring too.
His videos are quite boring, his exams were pretty much all based on his notes, got an A in his class even though I only went to about 3 classes in the second half of the semester. very easy marker

He's interesting and funny yet somewhat elitist at the same time. It's clear he thinks very highly of himself, and this may grate on some people. The course is challenging - no MC tests here, it's one of the few low level psych courses that is almost all written exams. Interesting and challenging.
contrary to what others have written here psyc 270 is very interesting. i like ledwidge's strange sense of humour and the textbook is engaging. personality psychology is NOT boring.

he FAILED me... i still dun get it... i understood the course material, took the tests and essay... and he still failed me... what da hell? and he walks around alot, always mumbles,dun even understand what he meant. textbook sucks too. videos are boring, too 70's 80's.dun take him if u want to pass.
Great prof... tells lots of "interesting" stories. He would be a great guy to sit down and have a beer with!
not clear, tends to ramble about irrelevant stuff
doesnt speak so clearly, but he knows a lot about the subject and has good experience. Some of his commentaries and use of words are funny. In general very good.

Sometimes difficult to understand through mumbling.  Material was boring (unbearably), but he did not bring enough depth to it through "experiences."  WORST textbook in history.  No comments about BL's other courses, but 270 is easy but boring.
Really great prof but really bad course material. Take 241 with him but try and avoid 270. It has been a waste of my life.
Freak'n Hillarious!!! Experience makes him interesting!
He is a wonderful teacher...The personal stories really make the class!  Too bad this is his last semester teaching!!!!
Very nice but goes a bit too fast
very interesting class... great prof.
good class ... he tells a lot of stories
really interesting course
No Comments
intelligent, good teacher, although marking on tests too picky (?)
No Comments
